_meta.source: Researched from Haines tourism, Alaska travel guides, and cruise resources

bbox_hint.note: Covers Haines town, Fort Seward, and Chilkat Eagle Preserve

transit_routes.name: Walk to Town & Fort
transit_routes.note: Easy walk from dock to both downtown and Fort Seward. Very small-town feel.

transit_routes.name: Eagle Preserve Tour
transit_routes.note: Bus or float trip to preserve. Best in Oct-Nov (salmon run) but eagles present all summer.

featured_experiences.name: Chilkat Bald Eagle Preserve
featured_experiences.note: Peak is October-November with 3,000+ eagles. Summer still excellent viewing.

featured_experiences.name: Fort Seward Arts Walk
featured_experiences.note: National Historic Landmark. Watch Alaska Indian Arts carvers at work.

featured_experiences.name: Authentic Small-Town Alaska
featured_experiences.note: Haines is the 'un-Skagway' - real Alaska town without cruise-driven tourism.
